Dear {!Student_Programme__c.Student__c},
Student ID Number: {!Contact.LSTM_No__c}
Programme: {!Student_Programme__c.Programme__c}
Start Date: {!Student_Programme__c.Programme_Start_Date__c}
We have partnered with Flywire to provide students with an easy and secure method of sending fee payments in your home currency. You can pay by bank transfer, credit/debit card and e-wallet methods.
The tuition fee in advance deposit payment for this programme is £1,000.
How to Pay:
1. Visit lstmed.flywire.com and choose your country and input the amount you are paying in GBP
Payment by international debit/credit card = £1,000 Payment by UK bank transfer = £1,000 Payment by UK credit/debit cards = £1,020.41 (incl. 2% fee)
2. Choose your payment method & make your payment to Flywire 3. Enter your details & those of the student you are paying for 4. Track & confirm your payment by email, SMS or by logging into lstmed.flywire.com
